page.title: 01NOTTINGHAM
page.content: This block takes in the city centre and most of the inner-city residential areas.The focal point used to be the Market Square,the shops being grouped round it and along streets radiating from it.The Victoria and Broadmarsh Centres have taken trade away from the central area,resulting in shops standing empty or changing hands. The Council is promoting tourism.The Square is being refurbished and buildings cleaned externally.Many streets have been closed to traffic to improve the environment. The area is multiracial including West Indians,Pakistanis and Indians. Housing varies from Victorian terraces to new council estates and includes the Victoria Centre flats and the Park private estate. The Lace Market produces world- famous Nottingham Lace.
